info.name: RESTful API with Java 18 and Spring Boot

request.description: Updates a person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person
Adds a new person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person
Deletes a person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person
Updates a book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the book
